author: CBC News
title: As the Russian army struggles in Ukraine, the West braces for what Putin might do next | CBC News
description: Russia has a grim, well-established playbook for fighting its wars that it departs from seldom. It isn't working in Ukraine. That has allied military officials and diplomats braced for what an increasingly desperate Vladimir Putin might do next.
content:
Russia has a grim, well-established playbook for fighting its wars.
Every country has one, but Moscow is notoriously iron-fisted in the way it wages its military campaigns. Just ask the Georgians an… [+7146 chars]
